definition: consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: A reasonable practice consideration should moderately higher than the theory consideration.
sentences.chinese: 合理的股改对价应适度高于理论对价。

sentences.english: We conceived that consideration and exchange ratio have greatly influenced M&A.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为股改对价和换股比例对合并双方的影响很大。

sentences.english: As one of the means for non-tradable shareholders to put their shares tradable, put warrants were issued and came into market.
sentences.chinese: 作为对价手段的一种，认沽权证开始规模发行并上市。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
